name: Wizardice
description:
Battle enemies by casting spells through combining dice!
Combine multiple dice for unique effects, experiment and become a master of magic to beat the final boss.

Warning: The main game should have sound, but the sound in the menu doesn't seem to play. So be aware of sudden sound.


Made for Godot Wild Jam with theme "combine" and wildcard "roll with it".
Made by myself, except for the background music which is by Tri-Tachyon.
